1. Show Advanced Options offers more filtering options that are probably not useful to most.
  2. Select the Export type.
    1. Output here
      1. Output here will provide a table of the data that you can copy and paste into another document program, like Excel, Google sheets.
      2. Select Export Now
    2. CSV File
      1. CSV File will provide a CSV file for you to download once you edit the URL
      2. Select CSV file then select Export Now button.
      3. At the top of the page, you will see three new lines of information.
